Command test $(awk '$5 < 2047 && $5 ~ /^[0-9]+$/ { print $5 }' /etc/ssh/moduli | uniq | wc -c) -eq 0 exit_status should eq 0
Command test $(awk '$5 < 2047 && $5 ~ /^[0-9]+$/ { print $5 }' /etc/ssh/moduli | uniq | wc -c) -eq 0 stdout should eq ""
